documents.document: Yay it's February! Forget Valentines, I can't wait for Pancake Day!
I refuse to accept the label of mental illness as an insult. Even for Trump https://t.co/SX56crDHrR #mentalhealth #immigrationban #MuslimBan
Latest - Can we stop blaming Trump's policies on mental illness please? https://t.co/SX56crVijp #mentalhealth @TheGirlGangHQ #thegirlgang
*Latest Post* You can't blame Trump's policies on mental illness just because you disagree with them. https://t.co/SX56crVijp #mentalhealth
*Latest* You can't blame Trump's policies on mental illness just because you disagree with them. https://t.co/SX56crVijp #mentalhealth
Why the #MuslimBan isn't because of Donald Trump's mental health. https://t.co/SX56crVijp #mentalhealth
I'm feeling very ranty about Donald Trump and how the media keep questioning his mental health. https://t.co/SX56crDHrR #thegirlgang
@girl_importance absolutely! Its only serving to restigmatise mental illness
@girl_importance that growing rhetoric. It doesn't address the problem or help counteract it
@girl_importance I know how you feel Ida. Its terrifying. And it makes me angry that the media is 'blaming' his policies on MH rather than
@girl_importance a lot of media outlets are trying to blame Trumps actions on mental illness but ignore the fact he has support
@girl_importance in America. But not because of mental illness. Because these people are actually racist, sexist, mysoginist narcissists
@girl_importance dismissive of how commonplace racism is. Trumps victory is no surprise. The Christian Right have been on the rise for years
@girl_importance he may have a mental illness, he may not, but suggesting he does when MI needs to meet diagnosis criteria is dismissive
@girl_importance rather it comes from a deep seeded misunderstanding and racism, and what people see as failure of political establishment
@girl_importance following trump alone is not evidence of mental illness
@girl_importance I look at it like this - we can't accuse his millions of followers and supporters of being mentally ill without evidence
You tweet that Sea World cares and I will unfollow you. Soz.
Ah here come. Just because he's a racist mysoginist bigot doesn't mean he is mentally ill. https://t.co/SccobbptW1
@CardiganJezebel Top one! I find them harder and harder to read as they go down; esp on a small device x
@BennyBiddulph Hahahaha I haven't heard that before!
"The discovery could help understanding of the causes of the mental health illness and could assist with the development of new treatments."
No, I do not have dandruff. My skin cells just multiple really effin fast
OMG scalp psoriasis is the worst
Gene possibly linked to depression identified via @rtenews https://t.co/Lxyb4us0rF #mentalhealth
March against #immigrationban at US Embassy this Thursday at 6pm. @UnitedARacism

Legit me right now https://t.co/VAfdzrfkvp
@veryberrycosmo more rest is needed Kayleigh. Hope you can take it easy today x
I'm seriously judging any celebs I follow on here who aren't acknowledging Trump. You're either for or against love, you can't be neutral.
This just screams dictatorship https://t.co/cCVcSM3ViA
@Mike_Douglas_ that's a good point. I mean, he can't can he? I just find it all too horrible to think about sometimes.
@RainyCupcake93 I totally get what you mean. I'm torn between doing that and needing to know what he's done now
"Life has to end," she said. "Love doesn't."
Asking you all for your tips. How do you look after your #mentalhealth in light of Donald Trump & his policies? #MHchathour
Okay, forgot my zumba class is on at 8pm. Soz #MHchathour 🙈🙈
Everyone's products are amazing and I would buy them all 😍😍 #thegirlgang
@ZoeAlicia101 I take it back this was very easy and the first thing I thought of 😂 #thegirlgang
A4. THIS IS SO HARD. Probs a self help book combined with a memoir. And only I would read it 😂 #thegirlgang https://t.co/lEUUuCDt3a

A3. People who stand up for what they believe in. Hopefully my readers see that in me #thegirlgang https://t.co/Rkc71Gen1h
@WithLoveCeleste brilliant advice thank you 😊
I just finished THE best goats cheese and beetroot and pear salad 👌👌👌 #thegirlgang
@FadedElementx welcome! And you can do it ❤❤❤ #thegirlgang
@poppiesinoct @dorkfaceblog I did the exact same. When all you see is beauty bloggers sometimes you just wanna fit in. #thegirlgang
@TheShaylaEm fair play I'm impressed! #thegirlgang
@LR_daydreamer and when I get home I am STARVING so the first thing I do is make dinner 😂
@WithLoveCeleste Hey Celeste! Do you find it easy to stay true or stick to your 'brand'? It's one thing I don't really get #thegirlgang
@LR_daydreamer thanks Lauren, it did. First time Ive made it here in forever 😅 #thegirlgang
@hollyquillsivy and I think that's the most important thing! When I stick around on a blog its because I like YOU #thegirlgang
@TheShaylaEm @dorkfaceblog yes! Just be you #thegirlgang
A2) oh god I don't know. I just blog and tweet about what interests me and who j am. So, hopefully? #thegirlgang https://t.co/TpHeRLlpqf
@eleanoraustin not at all! I read so many blogs and think that #thegirlgang
@sweet_allure hey friend!!
Hi all! Just home from work now #thegirlgang https://t.co/MBqw5jWAai
A1. "Will help you feel better" #mentalhealth #thegirlgang https://t.co/O8DtfokoVP
@AmyFox93 @Independent_ie I know 🙁 and bullying is so common we don't know what effect its having.

@TheGirlGangHQ I'm only home from work after 6pm but I will try to make it for such a positive topic #thegirlgang

@mblog101 I'll be there. Am very obsessed with this topic (esp now with world news)
Asking you all now for tips. How do you look after your #mentalhealth in light of Donald Trump & his policies? #TalkMH #thegirlgang
Feels like every time I refresh my Twitter feed there's a new and terrifying Trump update
@ClaireByReverie hahaa you're lucky! The whole picking sides and throwing dirt just gave me flashbacks 😂
@ClaireByReverie its so pathetic. And everyone is so quick to jump and pick sides. Reminds me of why I hated school so much.
@cmcoughlan @MentalHealth_Hr Hi Colette. I totally agree. #mentalhealthhour
@MentalHealth_Hr thank you for always hosting this. Just wish I was always able to make it x
@MentalHealth_Hr @lambertsmarc is full of encouragement and motivation #mentalhealthhour
Saying Trump is mentally ill and therefore unable to serve in office is grossly offensive to those of us with a mental illness.
@CharliePallett @mchiouji @NetflixUK The OA is on NetflixUK and its awesome x
@GrassrootsSP medication works for me. Ive faced a lot of stigma for choosing to stay on it; but I'm so glad Ive not given in to pressure
@CharliePallett @NetflixUK I wasn't feeling the first episode, but stuck with it and was happy I did. Otherwise, crazy ex girlfriend is fab
Actually in tears at this Superman comic. https://t.co/atOKguHBTy
The only Sunday dinner discussion today is Trump.
And on the eighth day Trump came for the Muslims. And we said 'not today' #letthemin #nobannowall https://t.co/wxvzaTxZiD
The world is a pretty scary place right now. Trump. Brexit. But there is still a powerful sense of empathetic hopeful humanity & we can win.
This is true people power #letthemin https://t.co/YjdtDfkeTS

Finally got my Amazon Kindle app back! Literally reading every moment of the day now

I got the La La Land soundtrack yesterday. Big mistake. Misty eyed on the bus into work. Full weeping expected shortly.
